New Records: David Miller contributed over half of South Africa's tally with 59 unbeaten runs
Key Match Events: Marco Jansen took 2/20 off his four overs
Anrich Nortje got himself on the board in the tenth over, removing Bas de Leede
Ottneil Baartman finished with figures of 4/11
David Miller scored two sixes and a four in the 19th over to take South Africa over the line
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams named an unchanged side from their opening encounters in Group D
Post-Match Reflections: David Miller was South Africa's hero as they defeated Netherlands by four wickets with seven balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa got their run chase of 104 off to the worst possible start, losing four wickets in the first five overs
Others: The match was played in New York in the Group D game of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
